subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Isiah Thomas has an 8-15 record as coach of the Knicks, but he enjoys job security through at least April 18, according to his boss, Madison Square Garden chairman James L. Dolan.
snippet: Isiah Thomas has an 8-15 record as coach of the Knicks, but he enjoys job security through at least April 18, according to his boss, Madison Square Garden chairman James L. Dolan.
